label: 惣中
本: Cities in Medieval Japan. ACTA ASIATICA, 44 . The Tōhō Gakkai . 1983
説明文: It was only in the Ōnin 応仁 and Bunmei 文明 eras (1467-1486) that Ōyamazaki could secure autonomy as a self-governing body (sōchū) by extricating itself from the control of the Hachiman shrine and winning the rights to administer civil and criminal affairs. [SS]
